documents.document: "I always wondered why somebody didn�t do something about that, then I realized I am somebody."
The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing. - Stephen Covey
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step. - Lao Tzu
The hardest thing to understand in the world is the income tax. - Albert Einstein
"There are only 3 colors, 10 digits, and 7 notes; its what we do with them that's important. - Jim Rohn"
"Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there. - Bo Jackson "
"In a gentle way, you can shake the world. - Mahatma Gandhi"
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.- Winston Churchill
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. - C. S. Lewis
All lasting business is built on friendship. - Alfred A. Montapert
I buy when other people are selling. - J. Paul Getty
Being defeated is only a temporary condition; giving up is what makes it permanent.- Marilyn vos Savant
Life is like a sewer. What you get out of it depends on what you put into it. - Tom Lehrer
Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority. - William Arthur Ward
The book you don't read won't help. - Jim Rohn
"When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it. - Jim Rohn"
"The first man gets the oyster, the second man gets the shell. - Andrew Carnegie"
I believe in the imagination. What I cannot see is infinitely more important than what I can see. - Duane Michals
"If you don't see yourself as a winner, then you cannot perform as a winner. - Zig Ziglar"

"If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree. - Jim Rohn"
"If you can dream it, you can do it. - Walt Disney "
Building a better you is the first step to building a better America. - Zig Ziglar
"The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity. - Peter Drucker"
Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes. - Zig Ziglar
Some people make things happen, some watch things happen, while others wonder what has happened. - Proverb
"The leader who exercises power with honor will work from the inside out, starting with himself. - Blaine Lee"
"Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while. - Jack Welch"
Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet. - Robert H. Schuller
A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him. - David Brinkley
No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution. - Niccolo Machiavelli
"Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the ""gotta have it"" scale. - Zig Ziglar "
"If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right. - Henry Ford"
"You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight. - Jim Rohn"
"Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don�t matter, and those who matter don�t mind."
"Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect. - Mark Twain"
The surest way not to fail is to determine to succeed.- Richard B. Sheridan
"Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops. - Thomas J. Watson"
No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution. - Niccolo Machiavelli
"He who asks is a fool for five minutes, but he who does not ask remains a fool forever.�Chinese Proverb"
Real riches are the riches possessed inside. - B. C. Forbes

Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself. - Plato
The wise does at once what the fool does at last. - Baltasar Gracian
You don't get paid for the hour. You get paid for the value you bring to the hour. - Jim Rohn
The majority of men meet with failure because of their lack of persistence in creating new plans to take the place of those which fail.
Enthusiasm moves the world. - Arthur Balfour

There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves. - Richard Rorty
Failure is not the end. In fact it is the beginning of a beautiful journey. - Jade Youssef
Real riches are the riches possessed inside. - B. C. Forbes

Fail often but do not forget the Lesson.

High expectations are the key to everything. - Sam Walton
An advertising agency is 85 percent confusion and 15 percent commission. - Fred Allen
Either you run the day or the day runs you. - Jim Rohn
An economist's guess is liable to be as good as anybody else's. - Will Rogers
I am looking for a lot of men who have an infinite capacity to not know what can't be done. - Henry Ford

Family farms and small businesses are the backbone of our communities. - Tom Allen
